availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, grocer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha M. Locker. Father of Mary E. Locker, Jame W. Locker and W. S. Locker. Served in Company H in 7th Regiment Kentucky Infantry.

bibl.p:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, District 2, stamped p. 361. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, Briensburg, p. 5.
Organization Index to Pension Files of Veterans Who Served Between 1861 and 1900, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series T286, Roll 159. Find A Grave, "John Phelps Locker (1825-1909)," Memorial #31227532, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=31227532&ref=acom (accessed 14 June 2016).
